channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Governance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Governance

item.title: CVE-2022-22462|2024-08-03T03:14:55.021Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance, Identity Manager virtual appliance component 10.0.1 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 225078.

item.title: CVE-2022-22452|2024-08-03T03:14:55.082Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Identity Manager 10.0 uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow a remote attacker to brute force account credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 224918.

item.title: CVE-2022-22455|2024-08-03T03:14:55.179Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance Identity Manager 10.0 virtual appliance component performs an operation at a privilege level that is higher than the minimum level required, which creates new weaknesses or amplifies the consequences of other weaknesses. IBM X-Force ID: 224989.

item.title: CVE-2022-22450|2024-08-03T03:14:54.991Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Identity Manager 10.0 could allow a privileged user to upload a malicious file by bypassing extension security in an HTTP request. IBM X-Force ID: 224916.

item.title: CVE-2022-22453|2024-08-03T03:14:55.094Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Identity Manager 10.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 224919.

item.title: CVE-2022-22470|2024-08-03T03:14:55.339Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 225232.

item.title: CVE-2022-22466|2024-08-03T03:14:55.325Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 225222.

item.title: CVE-2022-22460|2024-08-03T03:14:55.103Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Identity Manager 10.0 contains sensitive information in the source code repository that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 225013.

item.title: CVE-2023-35888|2024-08-02T16:37:39.908Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 258375.

item.title: CVE-2023-35888|2024-06-18T20:07:31.016Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 258375.

item.title: CVE-2023-35888|2024-03-20T13:25:12.617Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 258375.
